welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Normanton! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our town, known for its historical landmarks and friendly people. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that South Normanton has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport is one of the largest in the UK, handling a variety of goods and products.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments to and from the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
